::Perndabot::

A section of the shields of the Iron Fist flickers off for Perndabot
to pass, stays off for enough time to let Antagony pass, and then
turns back on. He lands and turns to her.

"Welcome to Alliance island," he says, motioning around at the Iron
Fist, the repair station, and the tunnel leading to the old Alliance
base.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jen D." <jeniff@h...> wrote:
> Antagony shook her head and looked around again. This bot wasn't
very 
> informative, so she'd have to find things out from somewhere else.
> 
> "No, that's good. Thank you." She said and looked at the Alliance
base which 
> they were approaching. She was eager to learn more about this
planet, but 
> she knew that the boring formalities of becoming a member of this
faction 
> would come first.
